column4: Curly Hair Solutions Silk Shampoo - Imported
column13:
Curly Hair Solutions Silk Shampoo - Imported (237 ml) Price: Rs.2800

Curly Hair Solutions Silk Shampoo 8 Ounce. Silk shampoo is a hydrating shampoo that nourishes hair with a rich and gentle formula. Pure silk protein moisturizes to leave hair silky smooth and shiny. Recommended for dry curly chemically relaxed or permed hair. Water based. Rinses out clean. Safe for everyday use.
